attributes.action: Encourage people to make and produce reusable cloth bags out of old unwanted fabrics, such as curtain materials, to promote community action, reduce textile rubbish and improve the chance of a sustainable ban of all plastic bags in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Provide grants and encouragement to local groups, to enable them to change and influence behaviour at a grass roots level, to reduce our reliance on all plastic bags. A reusable plastic bag still needs to be discarded eventually
